price: 50. Banganga balobi: Mabe ezali te, pamba te, mpo tokozongaka ya soló epai ya Nkolo wa biso!
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
